name: Victory Enterprises
tagline: You think it, we build it, you profit!
description:
Victory Apps builds native iPhone and Android apps utilizing the most advanced tools available for these platforms. You think of an idea, we work through the creative concepts with you and then we build it. We do not bill out at an hourly rate, instead, we look at your project, give you a set fee for the cost and then build out the iPhone and Android apps. After that we submit it to Apple for approval and upload to the Android store.
Then, we provide 6 months of debugging as part of the original cost. Take a look at our list of completed projects and feel free to call us at 800-670-5716800-670-5716 and discuss your project or email us at info@victoryapps.comFree via Skype
